alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County; Northern Blaine County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 7:55PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Showers with gusty winds will impact portions of northeastern Pondera, Liberty, Toole, northwestern Blaine, Hill and northeastern Chouteau Counties through 830 PM MDT... At 754 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers with gusty winds 8 miles north of Inverness, or 18 miles northeast of Chester, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Havre, Shelby, Chester, Parker School, Beaver Creek, Lothair, Joplin, Azure, Inverness, Agency, St. Pierre, Gildford, Sangrey, Boneau, Box Elder, Hingham, Oilmont, Rudyard, Rocky Boy and Tiber Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Some lightning may also occur with this activity. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
